Plot: Down on his luck, Ryan takes a walk through his favorite park to reflect on his life. In a twist of fate, he realizes that life isn't so bleak after all.
Title: Ryan at the Park
Writer: Luke Neuman (original idea), David Pratt, Sean Worsley (story)
Actors: Sean Worsley, Shannon Phelps, Jake Gorr, Jerod MacDonald-Evoy
